free_text.Learning outcomes: The aim of this course is to introduce some advanced techniques in quantum field theory and describe certain peculiar phenomena in particle physics that can be understood with them.[br/]
free_text.Content: 1. Basic formalism for interacting theories                                                                                                    2. Path integral and quantum effective action                                                                                               3. Renormalization group and running couplings                                                                                                   4. Symmetry breaking and quantum corrections                                                                                                5. Yang-Mills gauge theories                                                                                                      6. Effective theories                                                                                                           7. Symmetries and anomalies                                                                                            8. Thermal field theory                                                                                                      9. Tunneling and vacuum decay[br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Foundations of quantum field theory and gauge theories.[br/]
